metadata.title: CVE-2016-3170 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The "have you forgotten your password" links in the User module in Drupal7.x before 7.43 and 8.x before 8.0.4 allow remote attackers to obtainsensitive username information by leveraging a configuration that permitsusing an email address to login and a module that permits logging in.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
